overview:
Jason’s attention to detail, ability to exceed expectations, and provide incite into many aspects of a project makes him an invaluable asset to any company. He has been in web application development for close to 12 years and his experience “growing” with the internet has allowed him to amass a certain respect as well as ability to innovate and provide enhancements to a project.

Jason’s background is Java development, but over the past 6-7 years, he’s been a PHP developer working on WordPress, Magento, Joomla, osCommerce, xCart, and countless other open source applications, along with developing from the ground up applications. He has been a Technical Lead and Senior Application Developer, and have participated in countless RFPs, Requirement Gathering Meetings, Implementations, Support along with all aspects of development. Also versed in the Software Development Lifecycle and several software development methodologies such as MVC and Singleton.

Over the past few years, he’s been able to use jQuery and Code Igniter (PHP framework), to not only enhance development efforts, but also speed up the development times of certain projects to make the applications even more robust than initially requested.
